basic.description:
A course on a topic in the field of igneous and metamorphic petrology, geochemistry, and/or mineral-deposits geology.
NOTE    Consult the Chair of Undergraduate Studies for details of specific course offerings each academic year.
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Topics in Petrology and Mineral-Deposits Geology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 3 or above in a GEOL Major, Medial or Specialization Plan.
